name: bing-wallpaper
title: Bing Wallpaper
description: Get and set Bing wallpapers within 15 days.
author: koinzhang

preferences.name: applyTo
preferences.title: Apply Wallpaper To
preferences.description: Apply the wallpaper to which Monitor. Valid only when you are using an extended monitor.

preferences.name: downloadDirectory
preferences.title: Download Directory
preferences.description: The directory of wallpaper to download. Path format: /Users/Username/Downloads or ~/Downloads.

preferences.name: downloadSize
preferences.title: Download Size
preferences.description: The size of the wallpaper to download. Default is Original.

preferences.name: autoDownload
preferences.title: Advance Options
preferences.label: Auto Download Wallpapers
preferences.description: Automatically download all wallpapers to directory (default is /Users/Username/Downloads) when you enter the extension.

commands.name: bing-wallpaper
commands.title: Set Bing Wallpaper
commands.description: Get and set Bing wallpapers within 15 days.

commands.name: random-wallpaper
commands.title: Random Bing Wallpaper
commands.description: Set Random Bing wallpapers to desktop.
